Public beach access is less than a five minute walk from hotel.  Main beach and town are about a half mile down the road, but not really a long walk either, imo.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing such a detailed report on your stay at The Tides.  We are thrilled when our guests are happy and enjoying their special time away from reality here in Laguna Beach.  Please come again and we look forward to it.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary Heading: Great Location, friendly staff, great birthday offer!
Summary: We stayed for 3 nights over Labor Day weekend (and also my birthday). The rooms were fine, not luxury, but what you needed including fridge. Pool area wa beautiful and the staff were excellent. Loved the birthday offer - we paid the last 2 digits of the year of my birth for my birthday night.  Laguna beach is a great town with a really good atmosphere and a good selection of shops/restaurants/bars, all within walking distance of The Tides. The beach was pretty narrow for all the crowds - we preferred the beach at Newport Balboa Peninsula a few  miles up the coast. Overall, a great trip to Laguna beach and really liked The Tides.
Manager Response: Happy Birthday from the staff here at The Tides.  Isn't that great fun?  We are happy you had such a special occasion to celebrate and we hope Laguna Beach will be your next destination.  Joe and Judy  Resident Managers

Summary: We stayed at the tides laguna inn for our family vactaion and loved it. Joe and Dale were on point for all recommendations (entertainmnet, food, services)and very helpful. The entire staff was friendly and so.. nice. The inn is located in a great spot, 1 block from beach, walking distance to town/shops and close to great places to eat. Thanks for making our stay so great!!
Manager Response: We absolutely love making our guests happy and their vacations fabulous.  Thanks for staying with us at The Tides. Linda

Summary: I havent even left my room but had to write a review because I am blown away at the exceptional service.  My HBO wasnt working and I was looking forward watching it during my stay, as I dont use a TV at home. Dale at the front desk should get a raise or bonus for spending hours and constant follow-up to get the HBO channel to work for me. I got to watch 15mins of my show, True Blood, and I am still shocked at the service. This is so rare and I will definitely stay again.  The rooms are clean, affordable, 1blk from the beach, has parking, nice pool area, vending machines and great staff.
Manager Response: Dale always goes out of his way for our guests. but because of you we did solve some TV problems.....as far as a raise for Dale--you are too kind but we will all discuss it!  He is the best. We thank you for your understanding and hope you return. Linda

Summary Heading: 2012 Family Reunion at The Tides Inn Laguna Beach, Ca.
Summary: We had our Family Reunion at The Tides this year. We booked every room they have which was perfect for our size family. The Tides is in a great location for all sorts of activities. It is about a one and a half block walk to the beach so you don't have to worry about parking. They have plenty at the Inn. Joe and Judy are so kind, friendly and helpful. The pool area was an Awesome place for everyone to congregate. Plenty of tables and chairs. That became our main gathering area. Thank you Joe and Judy for a Great week. I'm from the Kansas City area and when I'm back in the area of Laguna Beach I know where I'm staying. Can't wait till next time!
Manager Response: We can't wait either! Adored and enjoyed your entire family. Thanks so much, Linda

Summary: I loved our stay at The Tides with my 2 boys, (9 & 11).  Room & bath were large, clean, cheery and had everything we needed.  I appreciated the fridge and the intelligent layout.  Location is great, across the street from the beach and within walking distance to everything.  Owners are very friendly and helpful and provided good coffee in the morning.  My boys enjoyed the pool.  Would definitely stay again - good value!
Manager Response: We all thank you so much.  You said everything we strive to be.  Our goal is "clean and affordable" plus our location is hard to beat!  We will look for you again.  Thanks for taking the time to write. Linda

Summary: If you're thinking of having a family reunion, The Tides is perfect.  We rented the whole place for our group of 62 and it was great.  The pool area is fantastic for any getogether . . .  complete with two bars, fireplace, pool, and lots of space.  Joe and Judy, the managers, supplied our every need.  Every room is different and unique.  Very welcoming!  A block to the ocean, nice restaurants, grocery store, etc.  We were there from Monday to Friday and everyone wanted to stay for more.
Manager Response: We all agree that your family truly knows how to have fun.  The Tides crew loved hearing your stories and watching all those happy kids in the pool and at the BBQ.   We would not mind being part of your group ourselves.  Hoping you can plan another get-away real soon.  We thank you for choosing us. Linda

Summary: First of all I would agree with the others that Joe and Judy Wood were superb hosts and were not only very nice but also went out of their way to suggest beaches, restaurants and events that they suggested we attend. Both restaurant recommendations were excellent and we really enjoyed the beaches in Laguna as they were secluded and within walking distance. As a matter of fact everything was within walking distance which was great. The only downside to our stay was the lack of king beds and the traffic noise particularly on Sunday night (the week days were much quieter). The inn provided ear plugs for the traffic noise which was a nice touch. It was really nice to be able to have beach chairs and towels and Judy let us keep the chairs and towels even after we checked out. We
Manager Response: Thanks for bragging on our location...isn't it great to leave your car in the complimentary parking spot and walk to everything, beach included?  We are so glad you enjoyed that.  We do have rooms with king beds so next time you call to reserve, please ask for availability.  Until your next visit,  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary Heading: Perfect family destination in Laguna Beach
Summary: Our family of 4 just returned from 2 lovely days at The Tides in Laguna. The price was surprisingly reasonable. The Tides is literally a block from Heisler Park and its beautiful ocean front walk to Main Beach. Also steps from a stop for the free summer Trolley. Our room was quaint, clean with a modern flat screen, nice shower, fridge, microwave and wi-fi. We had a little patio and a place to park our vehicle in front. We loved the coffee offered in the office in the morning. Managers Joe and Judy were so friendly. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking time out to write a review.  And we so appreciate that you enjoyed The Tides Inn.  Please come see us again soon.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary Heading: Perfect inexpensive in expensive Laguna Beach
Summary: Looking for an overnight stay in the expensive Laguna Beach, CA we ran across the Tides Inn. The room was large, airy, bright and in the middle of the town. The furnishings were from a discount warehouse but new, it was freshly painted and very clean. The owner (?) was charming and very helpful. The kitchenette spacious and although not used would be of help to those staying longer. This was a practical, utilitarian and very inexpensive alternative to the options 4-5 times more expensive. However, the duvet would have been more useful in colder climates
Manager Response: We are happy that you enjoyed our location and beauty.  And thanks for writing a lovely review for us.  We will look forward to your return visits.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary Heading: Not comfortable, but good location and friendly staff
Summary: This was our 6th hotel experience in Laguna, so we have a basis for comparison. We thought the people running the Inn are lovely-helpful and friendly. This was a big positive for us. They also keep the Inn clean and the location is good. Not on the west side of the PCH, but within walking distance to many things.  However, the three stars are for two problems we encountered during our stay. We could not take a shower in our room because the shower was so teeny tiny, I had no desire to deal with it and my 6 ft. husband didn't even think he would get clean. He would just keep bumping into himself....we were only staying for a couple of days...thank goodness!  Second, the pillows and mattresses in our 2 queen room needed to be replaced, especially the uncomfortable and worn
Manager Response: We are very sorry about your Tides experience.  It is rare that we get a complaint about our beds and bedding.  The shower is a problem and we are working on a solution--it is a winter project for us.  We are grateful as always for gracious guests with great ideas.  We hope you will try us another time. Thanks again, Linda

Summary Heading: Beach Town Paradise for a Bargain
Summary: The Tides is conveniently located within walking distance of the beach, restaurants, and shopping. The clean rooms are decorated like a beach cottage and quite comfortable.  The managers are friendly and keep the property clean and well-run.  We will definitely return.
Manager Response: It is so nice that you have taken time to post a review.  And thanks for enjoying The Tides so much.  Please return soon.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary Heading: Great experience at the Tides Inn
Summary: My family and I just returned from a 3 night stay at the Tides Inn.  I chose the Tides based on the consistently positive reviews it receives on Tripadvisor.  Despite the great reviews, I have to admit I'm wary of motels by the beach.  Many are skanky, old, noisy...with loud people partying by the pool.  I wasn't sure what we were getting ourselves into... To my great relief, the reviews were accurate.  Our room was really nice, with a clean hardwood floor, tasteful decor, crown molding on the ceiling, and beautifully painted walls. Everything was immaculate!  The best parts for me were the bed (plump pillows, great sheets and duvet) and the towels (the thickest towels I have ever seen at any hotel!).  I liked the fact that the bathroom was stocked with plenty of towels,
Manager Response: Well, you are a family member once you stay with us.  We truly believe only the nicest folks choose The Tides.  Thanks so very much for your kind comments--Just lovely for us that you took the time.  Hoping to see you again soon. Linda, Owner

Summary: We were given room 205, which was lovely, like a little apartment. It literally had everything we could possibly need in the room, full kitchen, etc. The staff was excellent.  My son had cut his foot on a shell on the beach, and they were very accommodating in getting me a first aid kit to clean him up. The bed was wonderful and the plantation shutters all around let loads of light in during the day and kept it plenty dark to sleep. Easy walk to the beach and lots of little shops & eateries very close. We ate breakfast at "The Cottage" which was wonderful and only about a 5 min walk from the hotel. The saltwater pool area was very nice, and seemed to have a layout for a nice nighttime atmosphere. For sure, we'll be back!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for such nice comments.  It is always nice to have a kitchenette and we have 3 rooms with full kitchens.  We will be happy to have you return.   September and October are gorgeous in Laguna Beach. Thanks, again. Linda, Owner

Summary: We stayed for 2 nights at the Tides Inn and had a really pleasant stay - the staff were extremely friendly, the room was gorgeously decorated and comfortable, and we enjoyed lounging by the pool! The location is great, right near lots of art galleries, the park and the beach and felt very safe and relaxing. For the price, we could not fault this place, it was wonderful!
Manager Response: We will be looking for you a third time also.  We were so happy with your description of The Tides.  You said everything we strive to be!  Thanks so much and see you soon. Linda, Owner

Summary: This hotel is a gem located on PCH in Laguna Beach.  The staff were extremely pleasant, accomodating and helpful.  Love the "personal" attention we received when in the office - as if we were the only guests on the property.  The location is perfect for parking your car and walking to restaurants, beaches, grocery stores and the center of Laguna.  We stayed in Room 202 which is upstairs right on PCH.  We love to sleep with the windows open, but traffic was a little heavy, so not a good idea.  We did notice in the middle of the night, you can open the windows up with very little traffic noise and enjoy the fountain sounds from the pool!  Our only disappointment was the size of the shower (like those found in inside cabins on cruise ships - tight fit for most), but the rest of the
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  We appreciate your comments.   Many of our showers are larger....mention that when making your next reservation.  We so look forward to your next visit.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary: We have stayed here twice, both times have been perfect. Ultra friendly staff, clean room and perfect location. No, this is not the Montage, better yet, a perfectly clean, fun, cozy, quaint beach motel. The pool is fantastic and we love the laid back vibe. The owners are so sweet. We love it, and will come back whenever we can getaway. Thank you Tides Inn!
Manager Response: We so appreciate your review and sincerely look forward to your next visit.  We love happy guests and try to do all we can to make you feel at home.  Warm regards,  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary Heading: Friendliest hotel staff I've ever encountered
Summary: We only stayed at the Tides for 2 nights, but the experience before booking the hotel, during the booking process, and afterwards (including our stay) was fantastic. I read all the reviews online and was a little skeptical because I didn't believe how a small local inn could be so great, but I definitely understand now, and will only stay at the Tides whenever coming back to Laguna. The staff was incredibly friendly, hats off to Joe and Judy for all their hard work and for an amazing establishment. I would recommend this Inn to anybody and everybody!
Manager Response: You just made our day:>).  Our goal is to provide a relaxing atmosphere for our guests and make them feel at home.  Thanks for the compliments and come back soon.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary Heading: Friendly Place with a Great Location
Summary: Our family of 4, planned a last minute Spring Break get away to Laguna Beach.  We read  the reviews on tripadvisor, which were quite impressive.  The staff and management were very friendly and accommodating starting with the phone reservation until we checked out.  They provided helpful information for dining and shopping, and bent over backwards to make things right. Our room was pleasantly decorated in a cozy country mode, with 2 comfortable full size beds, microwave, refrigerator, and a flat screen HDTV.  It was very clean with soft and fluffy towels.  The hotel provided beach chairs and nice beach towels.  Although we didn't swim in the pool, it was delightful to sit and read, or catch some rays. The location was suitable for walking to the beach, restaurants, supermarket,
Manager Response: We all thank you for the lovely comments.  Looking forward to your return visit and a swim in our salt water pool.  Very grateful for your thoughtfulness. Linda

Summary: My partner and I come to California form the UK every year. We decided to spend our first and last weekends at Laguna, we love it there. Our fist weekend we stayed at the Holiday Inn. We have stayed there before and think it is a nice although not cheap hotel. For the last weekend we found the TIdes on Trip Advisor and we are very grateful. This is an exceptional hotel, I cant believe that it is classed a two star. Our room was clean, decor was lovely. The bed was REALLY comfortable. For being so close to the road there was very little noise. The pool area was great really comfortable. We unfortunately didnt get a chance to sit by the fire at night.  On leaving the owner showed us some of the other rooms and it made us want to come back even more. In fact I want to get their
Manager Response: Thanks so much for sharing your nice comments about your recent stay with us.  It means a lot when our guests appreciate our "non-hotel" touches.  We have lots of fun changing things around all the time.  Please hurry back for another visit from the UK soon. Linda

Summary Heading: A great place to stay in Laguna Beach, CA!!!
Summary: Laguna Beach is Awesome in too many ways to list so just come,..trust me..We are staying at the Tides and lovin it!!! Perfect location, amenities,friendliness, cleanliness, all for a crazy good rate!!! We'll be back!!!!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for mentioning our "crazy good rate" because we are trying hard to give our guests the most for their hard earned buck.  We are aware of the current economic mess and believe coming to Laguna Beach should be affordable and take some stress away.  Hoping you return soon. Linda

Summary: I planned a last minute getaway to Laguna Beach so my 23 year old teacher-daughter could enjoy a few days of R&R while on Spring Break.  I found The Tides Inn on tripadvisor so gave it a whirl based on its good reviews.  Because we had called only a week before arrival, the best I could do was to book one room for the first night and a second, larger room for nights two and three.  No problem, though.  The staff (super friendly, helpful, and always accessible) moved our luggage.  Both rooms had incredibly comfy beds and ample linens; the shower in the first room was a bit tight.  The larger room had a bigger shower, nice deck and kitchen.  Admittedly, we did not use the kitchen, but had we stayed longer, good to know we'd have ample room to store PB&Js and some beach drinks and
Manager Response: We truly love the "High Fives" and thanks so very much.  Teachers always need a break and we are glad you enjoyed yours with us.  Mother/daughter get-aways are also special.  We look forward to your return visit. Linda

Summary Heading: Best hotel out of our So Cal trip - what a bargain
Summary: We went to Palm Springs, Laguna Beach and La Jolla. This was the least expensive hotel, but closest to the beach/town and the best sleep we had. Room was quiet, very clean and comfortable. Nice mattress and bedding. We did not use the kitchenette but a nice addition for when we stay longer. Flat screen tv and nice AC/heater remote control. Very close to several galleries, restaurants and the beautiful walking path along the coast. I hesitate to review this hotel, so it can be a well kept secret but the owners/inn keepers deserve this rating. We did not use the pool, but it was pretty and they had a nice outdoor flreplace. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: We are extremely happy that you DID write a review.  Thank you very much.  We are trying to keep Laguna Beach affordable for everyone.  We love what we do.  Hoping to see you back real soon. Linda, Owner

Summary: Originally from So Cal and am a diver and beach nut.  My wife and I always come down to Laguna when I visit family in town and were always looking for that 'special' place.  We tried some of the higher-end spots but when we found out about the Tides, we booked it.  Two nights and it should have been two weeks.  The Host Joe and his wife were absolutely wonderful to deal with.  The place is fabulous and I will not stay anywhere else in Orange County but will always come back to The Tides.........  Clean, very much a great value for what you pay, free paking; NOBODY else does that, wonderful pool area with an outdoor fireplace.  Just perfect.  You are walking distance from just about everything Laguna Beach as to offer...
Manager Response: We really do appreciate your taking the time to comment.  Seems like we have the nicest and happiest guests.  We look forward to your longer return visit.  Thanks so much. Linda

Summary Heading: Really Wish We'd Had Another Night
Summary: Very charming little boutique-y motel. The customer service was the clincher, and why I'd certainly come back, if ever in this area again. The evening staff stayed late when we called from Anaheim to see if we could get a room that same night, upon arriving he then mapped us out things we must do and see in town the next day. The morning staff was equally lovely. Did wish that their awesome birthday rates had applied to one nights stay (minimum is 2!) as we arrived on my birthday, and had been hoping to keep our last night under $100! Room was simple, clean, and the pillows were fabulous. Pool was really lovely, and while we didn't use it, we really wished we had the time to. Free parking was great, as well as the free wifi (which is a must when travelling internationally, as
Manager Response: We love being appreciated.  Thank you.  Hoping you are planning another "birthday" trip of at least 2 days.  Laguna Beach is a great place to celebrate anything! We try to give our guests as much "free" as we can--parking, wifi, beach supplies as well as "no" minimum stay.  Looking forward to your next visit. Linda, Owner

Summary: Although an older building, very well maintained. Very comfortable beds and pillows. Each room is decorated differently. Good water pressure in shower. Walking distance to downtown Laguna Beach and the beach.  A lovely cliff top park just across the road.  Motel is oriented so road noise is lessened. Pool is well maintained. Managers were very friendly and helpful with local information. We would definitely stay again
Manager Response: Thanks for your good advice for our future guests.  Our rooms are indeed different.  We do our best to find the one just right for each guest.  And thank you for staying with us and taking the time out to comment on our pretty Tides Inn.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary: Just returned home for our annual "sisters getaway" and had a fabulous time at The Tides ! Our own personal family members are in the hotel business for over 40+ years so I guess you could say we are hotel snobs ! It is the best kept secret in the Southern California beach area! The Tides is a small property that has been totally renovated but kept it's cute beach cottage feel.One block from the beach and a nice walk to town. We had rooms 212 and 213 which connect one had a fireplace the other a cute beach style galley kitchen and nice seating area with the cutest plate wall collection we have ever seen.The beds were very comfortable and the pillows too.The bed linens and towels top notch ! The place is immaculate ! Great fireplace to sit at out at the pool. The friendliness of
Manager Response: Your response is much appreciated....especially after you told us you were "hotel snobs" and loved our Tides Inn.  That is just a great review and as you see, we tend to details so our guests feel at home and ever so comfortable.  Thanks for staying with us and come again soon.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary: We stayed at The Tides over Christmas and it is a very nice small motel.  We were in walking distance of the beach, downtown and shopping.  The manager was very friendly and most helpful with checking in and checking out.  This is an older motel that is clean and small, I would guess about two dozen rooms, they still isssue a hard key and I felt like I was checking into a Holiday Inn from 1965, but with nicer sheets.  Our room was clean, but the bathroom was a little small, we had a corner shower and not very many outlets which made it tough to get all of our iphones and ipads charged for the night.  The pool looks very nice with a full fireplace and sitting area near it.
Manager Response: Many thanks for taking the time to review our inn.  We have tried to maintain charm in an attempt to make our guests comfortable.  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and please come back soon.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary: I'm a bit reluctant to make this review, because everyone will want to stay here. Kudos to Dale & Linda (owners) and Judy & Joe (managers) for The Tides. With each room uniquely decorated emanating understated elegance, this gem of an inn is subtly exquisite, oh-so comfortable, and none could be more welcoming and hospitable! This IS the place to stop and take in all the wonderful sensations of the nearby Pacific Ocean and simply enjoy your days and nights in Laguna Beach. Google it and check for yourself by viewing the virtual tour of the rooms and grounds at the their web site. Thank you very much D,L,J,&J - hope to see you again before too long.
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing and not keeping our Tides Inn a secret :>).  We do appreciate your fabulous review and look so forward to your next visit.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary: My girl and I went to Laguna beach to celebrate her Birthday and it was Wonderful because of the great place we stayed. "The Tides" was not like any hotel.....it was more like Home. The room has hardwood floors and nicely decorated and I've never slept better than on the soft cushy bed in our room. We were only a block from the beach and downtown was only a short walk. Now, I have to say how amazingly we were treated by Joe and Judy, the managers. They were warm and friendly and went out of their way to help....Great folks! Ant time I ever visit Laguna Beach, I will definitely stay at "The Tides.
Manager Response: We just love knowing you feel at home here.  Your review is lovely and so very much appreciated by all of our staff.  Thanks and we will see you again soon.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary: In 34 years of marriage we have never been treated so nice by motel/hotel magagers. Joe and his wife were just best. The room, bedding and bathroom were very clean. We intended to stay just one night but were having so much fun being by ourselves finally that we stayed over a second  night. Great value and perfect location. Everything you need is just a short walk. Beaches, dining, shopping. We will be returing for sure. You won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: How nice of you to mention the heirloom.  Linda and Dale (owners) have collected such beautiful items to remind you of home and heritage.  Thanks for being here and we will look so forward to seeing you again.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary: I stay here at least 2 times a year and I love it. The owners and staff are wonderful.
Manager Response: Fabulous...we just love it that you come back over and over again.  We look forward to your next stay.  And thanks for the review.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary Heading: Great value, awesome location, comfy clean rooms
Summary: Great service, nice beds, spacious rooms, walk to village and beach. Las brisas across the street as well as beautiful Heisler park.   Would return in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: So happy to hear all the good things you've reported.  We try to make you feel at home and I'm glad you liked it.  We will see you next time.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary: good rooms,well furnished and kept very clean.nice to have free internet connection
Manager Response: So happy you felt so at home.  Please come see us again.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary Heading: Perfect Stay at The Tides Inn
Summary: Have just returned from a 4 night stay at the Tides Inn in Laguna Beach, CA, which is my second stay there.  The Tides is a small, intimate hotel with a lovely owner.  The rooms are all unique, approximately half have a kitchen or kitchenette of some sort.  There is a lovely salt water pool and outdoor fireplace area.  We used the pool area for a wedding rehearsal dinner and it worked out perfectly.  Location is across the street from the ocean - walk everywhere for great food and shopping and just plain wondering around.  You won't go wrong staying at the Tides.
Manager Response: Your review is so much appreciated.   Three of our rooms have full kitchens, several have kitchenettes (no stove or oven).  We also have a gas grill down by the saltwater pool for outdoor dining pleasure.  Please come see us again when you can.  Judy and Joe  Resident Managers

Summary: My husband & I just stayed here for our anniversary. Judy and Joe are so friendly and personable. The room was so comfortable. I think we found our new getaway spot! Location is perfect. Great value.
Manager Response: We are so happy you found a new hide-away in The Tides Inn.  Laguna Beach is just full of charm and we try to keep that feeling going here at our inn.  Thanks for being here and we will look forward to your return.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary: My husband and I just went to The Tides Inn for the first time to celebrate my birthday.  We had the greatest time.  We highly recommend The Tides Inn.  Each room is different, ours was great, Room 207, with a kitchenette, king-sized bed that was super-comfortable, and the room is decorated so beautifully.  We didn't meet the owners, but did meet Judy and Joe, the resident managers, who were super-friendly and helpful!  Everything about our stay at The Tides Inn was 100% perfect, and we will definitely be back!
Manager Response: We just love the 100% part of your review :>).  We strive for excellence every day so every guest feels at home and totally "away from it all".  Thanks for your kind words.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary: Stayed here only one night, but everything was great during the time we were there.  Checked in right at 3pm and the room was ready and check in was quick.. We were in Room 206 which had a king sized bed and a mini-fridge. The room was clean, the bed was comfortable and just outside the bathroom was a great little mirrored table which was perfect for putting make up on and getting ready.    The location is very central.  If you don't mind walking a few blocks, you can easily get to many shops, restaurants and bars.  The hotel is just across the street from the beach also. Didn't use the pool since it was cold out, but the pool looked like it would be inviting on a sunny day.    Everyone on the staff that I dealt with over the phone, via email or in-person provided wonderful
Manager Response: Thanks for bragging on us.  We do appreciate it.  We are so glad you like like our location and all we can offer.  Please come see us again soon.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary: A girl's weekend away to celebrate a 60th birthday.  We had a suite and an adjoining room for the 5 of us, and it was perfect.  We had a nice, full kitchen and a large table and chairs great for playing games.  The adjoining room had a big fireplace and the hotel manager prepared the logs for us to light when we returned from dinner.  The decor of both rooms was lovely. quaint and beachy.  The beds were extremely comfortable. The flat screen TV's were very up to date.  All in all a great experience and we will all return again.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to have you as our guests.  We love to see that you enjoyed the ammenities.  We appreciate your comments and look forward to your next visit.  Joe and Judy Resident Managers

Summary: Well what can I say apart from we loved it, we loved it so much we returned for the last nights stay of are 3 week holiday from England, lovely location, lovely people, the facilities were perfect, great rooms and pool area, our every need was catered for, the managers and staff could not have been anymore helpful even when we had to take an emergency trip to the doctors, escorting us and allowing us to check out a bit later due to this. All I can say is a big Thank You and we will be returning soon. I will be recommending The Tides Inn to all my family and friends. Nicola and Mark - October 2011 - England.
Manager Response: When the unexpected arises, we are here to help you if we can.  We are just so glad everything turned out well for you and that you enjoyed your stay despite the visit to the hospital.  Best to you and return to us from England when you can.  Warm regards,    Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary Heading: Comfortable Inn for a decent price
Summary: My teenaged son and I stayed here for three nights in a room with two double beds and a kitchenette. I have travelled quite a bit over the years (mostly trips in the U.S, Mexico and Canada) and I have stayed in budget motels and in lots of Four Season's and Fairmont hotels and everything in between. I have decided that I prefer to stay in hotels that have some character. We really enjoyed the Tides Inn. Our room was nicely decorated and the kitchenette was handy. The room was clean and the AC worked well. Our room was above the reception office and it was a quiet location. The beds were very comfortable and I felt at home in our room.     The couple that managed hotel were friendly and helpful. The pool area was nice and there were lots of chairs. The fireside seating area was
Manager Response: We thank you for the comprehensive report on The Tides.  Our location favors leaving your car parked the entire stay to enjoy the beauty and charm of Laguna Beach.   We love knowing you did that and that you will come back to see us again.  Until then,  Judy and Joe Wood Resident Managers

Summary: I chose this place based on the reviews and was glad I did.  I wanted a night away with the wife, no kids.  Sleep in on Sunday, like that ever happens with kids.  The Tides was perfect.  Clean room.  Books in a book case, guest sign in book.  Woke up Sunday, late, wife read a book, I got to watch football in bed.  Wife loved it. Judy was a perfect host.  Suggested a walking route and dinner suggestions.  Let us leave our car there so we could walk into town for lunch. Only one night away.  The Tides made it feel like 3 days of vacation.  The beds, pillows and lined were better than I expected.  Can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you were able to completely relax at The Tides.  That is what we strive to accomplish and we appreciate knowing you enjoyed it.  We look so forward to your next visit.  Judy and Joe Wood Resident Managers

Summary Heading: A little like having your own beach cottage.
Summary: We stayed in their largest room, number 212. It had a full kitchen, a breakfast sitting area that accommodated about four people,  two beds and a bathroom. The bathroom was pretty small, but the room was good sized and made up for it by being decorated in a nice eclectic style. The staff was very nice and the property is pet friendly. The hotel is in a good location and is walking distance to beach and nice restaurants.  We would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review.  We strive to make our guests feel at home and we look forward to your next stay.  Judy and Joe Wood Managers

Summary Heading: Perfect Home away from Home in Laguna Beach, CA-
Summary: The Tides Inn is owned and managed by a delightful, warm and inviting team. This is reflected in their tasteful rooms and the property. I had quite the unintentional and prolonged stay as my move to Laguna Beach was delayed and delayed. The Tides provided myself and two pups a large room (basically a studio with a full kitchen) that couldn't have been more comfortable and practical with its location just walking distance North of "The Village" and across the street from beautiful Heisler Park where one can assure a breathtaking sunset is in store. Beach access is easy; the pool and adjoining outdoor kitchen area are fantastic for grilling out and relaxing.  I definitely recommend The Tides Inn to anyone visiting Laguna. You will feel their personal touch in beautiful Laguna
Manager Response: Oh how we love to hear that your stay was pleasant.  You know you are welcome any time and thanks for sharing your thoughts about our gracious Tides Inn.  Judy and Joe

Summary: We decided last minute to head down to Laguna Beach for one night during Labor Day weekend and this spot was perfect.  Clean, comfortable rooms with useful kitchenettes, easy beach access and very cute pool area.  Was lovely to walk to and from the center of town and get a little exercise each time as well.  I'd definitely go back!
Manager Response: Your comments were most gracious and we are so happy you enjoyed our beautiful little inn.  We will look forward to your next weekend getaway.  Judy and Joe Wood

Summary: If you're interested in sterile, bland or "corporate," better keep looking. The Tides is a charming beach motel with individual touches.  My friends met my husband and me to celebrate my birthday, which the pool area more than amply accommodated. There is a beautiful fireplace, lots of seating, and two "bar" areas for private gatherings. It was very nice, and while we were not the only ones using the pool area, the space and layout gave us privacy.  The room was very nice. Ours had a kitchenette, which proved to be perfect. (I had brought my own champagne glasses from home, and it turns out I didn't need to.) The room is larger than one might expect, and I appreciated the stack of books waiting for me. The titles appeared to be thoughtfully chosen depending on what I might like:
Manager Response: Your description is so much appreciated and will surely beckon travellers to our Tides Inn.  We take great pride in making each guest feel special and that all details are attended to promptly.  Thank you and see you next time.  Judy and Joe Wood

Summary: We visited Laguna Beach for the 7th year in a row for the Pageant of the Masters.  We found the Tides Inn the first year, and have never looked for anything else.  The various rooms are charming and clean with great bed linens.  The manager Joe is very accommodating on any and all requests.  The location is walking distance to pretty much everything, including the main city beach.  There is significant traffic noise if you like your window open, but there is air conditioning, of course.  Several units have outdoor chairs right outside the door to enjoy the lovely weather while having a drink or snack.  Definitely consider the Tides!
Manager Response: We strive daily to make our inn charming and enjoyable.  Thanks for your great comments.  We look so forward to your next stay.  Judy and Joe Wood

Summary Heading: Great place but avoid room 103 if you need sleep!
Summary: Firstly it has to be said that Joe and Judy were great and clearly know Laguna Beach well and demonstrate real pride in The Tides. We stayed for 4 nights and the first 3 were fine (apart from road noise but that was to be expected) but our last night was ruined by people staying in the room upstairs. They didn't sleep and neither did we!   The pool area was lovely and the overall concept worked really well. We'd like to come back but would request a different room... perhaps upstairs.
Manager Response: Oh dear.  We are so happy you will come back and request a room upstairs.  We are always happy to call the offending party and ask them to quiet down....but we must know about it while it is in progress to address the situation.  So sorry we didn't know.  We look so forward to your next visit.  Judy and Joe

Summary Heading: All fur coat and no knickers
Summary: Great concept and nice clean rooms but it wasn't worth the room rate. Admittedly they are refurbishing right now but service was scarce. Gym and pool were great but location is next to the SF fire dept so expect sirens from 7am!
Manager Response: Oh dear.  I'm afraid you've described another location other than The Tides in Laguna Beach.  We are not near the San Francisco Fire Dept. nor do we have a gym.  Please do come see us at The Tides.  Judy and Joe Wood

Summary: We stayed at the Tides for one night on our way home from Northern California.  The room was small and rather sparse but the bed was comfortable and the linens were nice.  The person checking us in (I believe her name was Judy) was very nice and gave us helpful advice.  We were going to the Pageant of the Masters that evening and she told us the best way to go.   Had breakfast at The Cottage just down the street and it was lovely.  We felt that the $300.00 a night was quite inflated even for Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for the lovely review. We were surprised and concerned by your final comment as our rates range from $195 to $235 per night unless you are including our 12% hotel tax and perhaps an extra person charge or pet fee of $25 per night.  We do have a beautiful and quite large suite that is around $300 but that does not sound like your accommodation.  Please contact us if we have overcharged you.  Thanks so much.

Summary Heading: Just as nice as the first time we stayed here!
Summary: We made a return trip to the Tides after a brief birthday weekend here last year. We are glad we did! The staff is friendly and the rooms are comfortable, cozy and a fantastic deal for the area. We especially liked the fire by the swimming pool in the evenings. We won't stay anywhere else when we are in Laguna!
Manager Response: Your comments are so much appreciated.  The fireplace area is a great relaxation under the stars.  We are so glad you like The Tides and thanks for returning time and again.  Judy and Joe Resident Managers

Summary: What a wonderful little inn.  My son (1 year old) and I stayed here over the past few days for a family get together.  My 3 sisters and their families were also staying here.  We stayed in room 205 which was perfect!.  King bed, dressing area with mirror, small fridgerator, and small bathroom with shower.  The room was clean, bright, and the bed and linens very comfortable! They even have some rooms with kitchens, and my sister had 2 rooms connected by a small private entry with a kitchen. The pool was very refreshing after a long day, and they even provided beach towels and supplies.     The location is perfect.  Within walking distance to Main beach, downtown, restaurants, grocery store, coffee shops.....hardly had to use my car.   I will definitely be coming back to The Tides
Manager Response: We appreciate your review so much.  Thank you and we look so forward to your next visit.  Judy and Joe Wood

Summary: I originally found this hotel four years ago when traveling to Laguna for Pagent of the Masters.  I needed a place that would allow a big dog since I have an afghan hound and so many places only allow 20lb. or under.  The folks at The Tides love seeing my dog as much as me!  I have my "regular" room that I request every year that is quaint and charming with a small patio.  I absolutely LOVE the location of this place and that they have their own complimentary off-street parking!  If you get a room with a kitchenette, there is a grocery store a block away, they are located amougst some great art galleries and just a few blocks from Main beach.  We walked to the beach every morning which was 1 block away.  Location is fantastic and so is the management and staff.  When we had an
Manager Response: Many thanks for your review.  We look forward to your stays here and so glad you "repeat".  We strive to make each stay enjoyable and comfortable.  Until next time, thanks so much.  Judy and Joe

Summary: If you are traveling with a dog, the Tides Inn will make you instantly feel like a local.  I spent four nights and enjoyed my stay immensely.   Everyone working at the tides was friendly. They made me feel very welcomed and offered great advice on the area.  My room, 208 was a little eagle‚Äôs nest on the third floor.  I was great - Just one neighbor, fabulous ocean breezes, nice little patio space as well as a decent size bathroom.  I loved how quickly we were on the beach.  I spent hours exploring the coastal beaches every day.  There were numerous nearby restaurants that accommodated dogs which made enjoying a good meal in a beautiful location easy.  They have a great pool area with a nice BBQ including a built in counter space and mini fridge.    So if you want to travel with
Manager Response: We so enjoyed your stay with us.  Laguna Beach is so dog friendly making it pleasurable to navigate our precious little city by the sea.  We look forward to your next visit and your doggie is always welcomed.  Judy and Joe Wood Managers

Summary Heading: LOVE IT! Fantastic staff, clean rooms, comfortable beds, boutique feel.
Summary: I have stayed at The Tides several times over the past couple of years and am always more than happy with my experience. All the staff- Linda (owner), Judy, Joe, and Dale are so warm and helpful. The rooms and property are very clean, beds are comfortable, pool is warm with a great fireplace and bbq in pool area, and each room has a personal touch with unique artwork and thoughtful quotes adorning the walls. My husband and I fell so in love with The Tides that we booked the whole hotel for our wedding. It ended up being perfect! Every single guest commented on how helpful, warm, and wonderful The Tides staff is (Judy even sewed on one of the groomsmen's buttons when it fell off). They were intent on staying at The Tides when they returned to Laguna. Further, we all had such a
Manager Response: What a treat to hear such lovely things about the Tides.  Your entire group was a delight and it was our great pleasure to have you as our guests.  We take great pride in making sure every detail is attended to and that you are happy.  Thank you for choosing the Tides and until next time,  Judy and Joe Wood Managers

Summary: I attended the same weekend wedding as "amywesthollywood" and have to say I had a great experience.  Joe and Judy, the onsite managing couple, were as accommodating as could be from the minute we came in.  They were comparable to those "cool" parents with their set rules while having some flexibility. For example, the rooms were non-smoking (a fine was enforced); however, the option was given to smoke on your private outside patio or balcony.  I appreciate the option for all of my smoking friends as a former smoker myself. They were flexible in allowing a private food truck on the property for the wedding rehearsal dinner and allowed us to bring bottle beverages poolside so that we could  enjoy our intimate party alongside the lovely salt water pool and it's optional fountains.
Manager Response: We suggest our guests do see as many of our rooms as possible as they are all designed differently ranging from a simple bed with bath to our largest suite which has a separate 2 queen bedroom, small dining area and full galley kitchen.  Our prices vary accordingly.  Thank you for the lovely review and we look so forward to your next visit.  Judy and Joe Wood Managers

Summary: I have just come back from a wedding weekend and had to write a review on the most amazing hotel. I travel for work quite a bit, have stayed at The Four Seasons, The Ritz, etc. The Tides in Laguna Beach is not that type of hotel in terms of opulence, but one in which you feel that you are staying with family. My friends rented out most of the hotel for their wedding. All of the rooms are very quaint and cosy, and most that I saw had small kitchenettes, which was great for coffee, etc. The management is the loveliest couple that welcomes you with a huge smile upon arrival, and are eager to make their guests feel welcomed. We never 'wanted' for anything, and they helped our every need. The pool is really cute, with fountains squirting across, which helps echo some of the PCH
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your detailed review.  We appreciate your comments as we try hard to please our guests and, in deed, make each guest feel very much at home.  See you next time.  Judy and Joe Wood Managers

Summary Heading: This place is fantastic in every way....
Summary: Georgeous view, most specially decorated rooms(each one is different), great location, wonderful pool with fireplace outside stocked with wood.  There is a big barbacue out  by the pool with stove, frig, seating, so we were able to cook breakfast each day for everybody outside!  This was a family wedding and so lots of the family  stayed there.   The people who manage(Judy and Joe Wood), who run THE TIDES are the nicest people you can imagine.  They will accommodate you in ways you would never expect.     The prices are very reasonable, they have different types of rooms(you ought to see as many of the rooms as you can and see how they are decorated-t hat in itself is terrific).  I wish I had a reason to go back there again soon.    The mother of the bride, my cousin, had the
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review.  We are thrilled to have wedding parties take the entire motel as your group did.  It makes it so much fun for everyone.  And we love catering to every little whim and fancy.  Your group was marvelous and always welcome at any time.  Judy and Joe Wood Managers

Summary Heading: What a gem of a place!
Summary: This is a wonderful little spot for those of us that like quaint, unique places to stay while traveling. What struck me most about The Tides is the attention to detail in the rooms and  pool area. My room smelled like soap, and the entire place is very clean. The location is right in the heart of Laguna Beach, and half a block away is one of the most gorgeous ocean front parks I have ever seen. A true gem!
Manager Response: We are pleased you feel our Tides Inn is unique.  We strive to be sure our rooms are clean, comfortable and inviting.  We look so forward to your next visit.  Judy and Joe Wood Managers

Summary Heading: Perfect getaway for us and our dog!!!
Summary: We were looking for some place we could bring our 70 lbs dog with us and came across this hotel on bringfido.com. After searching and reading all the reviews, so I decided to contact the hotel. Joe (manager) was very awesome!! He had responded my emails very quickly and answered all my questions before I even made a reservation.. The hotel is nice, clean and safe, everything is in walking distance. And it is so close to the beach & park where we could walk our dog & have him play in the ocean... We definitely come back again & again. Highly recommend especially people with dogs..... Thanks to Joe & Judy (my dog, Alaska really liked the treat  you gave him and he wants to go back & get some more....:-).
Manager Response: We are so pleased you were comfortable at The Tides.  Your dog  is just gorgeous and we loved having Alaska as our guest.  There are more doggie buscuits for Alaska and we look so forward to your next visit.  Judy and Joe

Summary Heading: Loved it!  We'll be back for sure!
Summary: We blocked all 21 of the rooms for the weekend of my daughter's wedding in May.  Joe and Judy, the managers, as well as one of the owner's who was on site, were so accommodating and friendly.  Several of the rooms have kitchens/kitchenettes and the pool area has a great bbq, bar and fireplace, so family and friends were able to gather together for breakfasts in the morning and cocktails at night.  Our rooms were very comfortable and clean - loved the decorating.  Plus it's within walking distance of the beach and downtown!
Manager Response: It was a delight to have your family and loved ones here for the wedding celebration.  Congratulations to the newlyweds and we hope for many years of happiness.  All of you please come back when you can....we will be here for you.  Judy and Joe

Summary: We rented out the whole hotel for our wedding weekend in Laguna Beach.  The rooms were so charming, the location was perfect, and was an easy walk to everywhere important in Laguna. We bbq'd by the pool and relaxed by the fireplace.  The staff was SO friendly and accomodating!  Everyone who stayed had the best time.
Manager Response: We are just so pleased that you chose The Tides to enjoy your wedding celebration.  Your entire group was a delight and we hope to see you many times in the future.  Congratulations to the newly married and many great years to come.  Judy and Joe

Summary Heading: Quaint beachy rooms, with variety, kitchens, and wonderful outdoor gathering space
Summary: We stayed in several rooms, for ourselves and other families and friends, for our desitnation wedding.  The inn was very accomodating and everyone was relaxed and comfortable staying there.  We spent lots of time walking from there to downtown Laguna and local restaurants, and gathering with about 25 friends in their outdoor space that has a pool, outdoor fireplace, grill and outdoor kitchen with counter.  The kitchens are handy, especially with kids, but not fully equipped.  Paper plates and cutlery worked best.   This was the perfect place for our large group, at an affordable price, that provided a variety of rooms, and close proximity to Laguna Beach proper.  We loved it!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your lovely review.  We love knowing you enjoyed our great pool area and found it so inviting....a lot like home we hope.  We look forward to your next visit.  Judy and Joe

Summary: We blocked out the entire 21 room hotel for the weekend for my cousins wedding.  Every room in the hotel was decorated differently and so adorable.  Joe and Judy, the managers were kind and accomodating and took very good care of us to make sure we had everything we needed.  We really enjoyed the pool area and spend 3 days bbqing, sitting by the fire and relaxing.  Thank you and we will definitely be back!
Manager Response: We so appreciate reviews like yours and we genuinely enjoyed your stay with us.  What a great group you were and we hope you will indeed be back.  Warm regards,  Judy and Joe

Summary Heading: Best place for a romantic Birthday! :)
Summary: WOW! We can't say enough about The Tides! We stayed in room 205 on the 25th and 26th for my Birthday. It was an excellent getaway spot for us! The first thing that struck us both was the people. Joe, Judy, Linda and Dale were AMAZING! They made us feel right at home from check-in to check-out. Our room was clean and comfortable with a nice view down to the great pool area and the ocean. You can tell that the place is older, but that just adds to the charm. We call it "vintage". It's totally updated, well maintained and screams old California beach! We spent time exploring Laguna (everything is walking distance) and enjoying the saltwater pool and fireplace. My husband built a romantic fire in the outdoor fireplace and we sat by it for a few hours playing games. We'll be staying
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife and I just spent the weekend at The Tides and could not have been any happier.  Check in was so simple and nice conversation.  Went to our room on second floor #207! Tastlefully decorated with perfect size kitchen and comfortable bathroom.  King size bed was comfortable and nice flat screen tv if needed.  We had a nice view of the ocean and the hills off in the distance.  The walk to town or beaches were very easy.  Sat by the outdoor fireplace Friday night and had great conversation with some other guests.  Pool is nice size and plenty of chairs for lounging.  If needed an outdoor grill and bar are their for your use.  Property is off the PCH but we never had any problem with traffic noise.  We will certainly return.  Thank you Joe!
Manager Response: We love reviews like yours.  It is a pleasure for us to know you've enjoyed The Tides so much.  Isn't the fireplace down by the pool great?   Lots of friendships have formed there.  Thanks and we hope to see you soon on your next visit.  Joe and Judy

Summary Heading: Relaxing, get away with excellent service!
Summary: My husband and I stayed in room 209.  It was exactly what we wanted.  We were in the area visiting my sister who lives in Newport Beach.  We stayed closer to her home last year and really enjoyed it, staying at Bay Shores Peninsula.  That too was great!  We just wanted to experience another coastal city near her and Laguna Beach was our choice this time around.  For both trips, I consulted TripAdvisor for our hotel choices as well as restaurants, it was more than helpful. Our hosts,  Joe and Sandy (I think that was her name), were wonderfully helpful.  Ask them for advice about where to go and what to see in the area; very friendly and knowledgeable folks.  We are the type of people who like to experience the city, walking from point A to point B is one of the best parts of the
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice comments.  We truly strive to make our guests happy and create an "at home" feeling.  We are so proud of our Laguna Beach and we are glad to hear you experienced it with gusto.  Joe and Judy

Summary Heading: Fantastic wished we stayed for longer
Summary: FANTASTIC. Everything about this place we loved. The rooms were very homely and comfortable. It was a short stroll into town, GREAT Service couldn't have done enough for us. If your staying at Laguna Beach this place is a must. We stayed with our Mum and Aunty and they too loved it. Really happy guests and hope to be back.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you and your family loved The Tides.  That is such a compliment to us as we strive to create a charming atmosphere.  Thanks for coming and please return to see us.  Joe and Judy

Summary: My kids and i needed a little quick getaway.  We decided to stay at the tides based on a recommendation from a friend. Needless to say it was one of the best, relaxing, vacations I've taken in a while. The rooms and staff were pleasant. We enjoyed our stay.  Note:  parents traveling with kids, make sure you get a downstairs room;).
Manager Response: We are so delighted you enjoyed your stay at The Tides.  Isn't the location fabulous for the children to go down to the tide pools and swim in our salt water pool, too.  We look forward to your next stay.  Judy and Joe Wood Managers / The Tides

Summary Heading: Location and managers make this place very good
Summary: In between a blizzard at home and a week-long trade show in Anaheim, my husband and I stayed here for two nights.   The negatives: The bathroom could use some updating and the kitchenette was not really equipped for doing much more than making coffee or storing leftovers.  I am incredibly sensitive to smoke and our "neighbors" were outside their room smoking during the first night--I was a bit bothered by that.    The postives:  Our room was clean and the bed very comfortable.  The place feels like a good friend's guest room--we liked that.  The couple who manage the place were very friendly and helpful with directions and restaurants.  We loved being able to walk over to Heisler Park and to the downtown area where many restaurants were located.    Overall, we were quite pleased
Manager Response: We thank you so much for your comments and we are happy you will return.  The maintenance of our rooms (and upgrading process) is an ongoing project which began  eight years ago.  We try to preserve the charm while making our rooms comfortable, affordable and gracious.  We look forward to your next visit.  Joe and Judy Wood Managers of The Tides

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stop in and stay for a night or two or more.
Summary: I am happy to know that this place exists.  What a treat.  Well appointed extended room when you get one with the kitchette.  For a couple of nights, a refrigerator for left overs and snacks, high end microwave, coffee maker and toaster.  Equipped with necessary kitchen needs.  To a detail, decorated with exquisite taste.  And a place you want to think of as your room when you come through this beautful town.
Manager Response: We are so glad you felt at home here.  That is what we want to accomplish....a home away from home atmosphere.  Thanks for choosing The Tides.  Joe and Judy

Summary: We stayed one night at the Tides. The managers are exceptionally nice and accomodating people and went out of their way to be helpful. The room we stayed in was clean for the most part, but in need of some updating.  The bathroom floor is old vinyl with holes and cracks.  The shower is in need of regrouting and cleaning. The walls are paper thin.
Manager Response: We strive to update our rooms and it is a constant ongoing process.  Our property is elderly but we try to maintain the charm at the same time trying to keep it spotless.  Please come see us again.  Joe and Judy

Summary: My husband and I took our first needed vacation in at least 2 years and this was one of our last stops along the road. We were taking a 7 day road trip and decided we wanted to stay at the beach for 2 days. We chose The Tides almost randomly, It had fantastic reviews on TripAdvisor, and believe that the area was just what we needed to escape our very hectic lives. Well I found my new heaven. Since I am writing this several months later( usually I write a review immediately) I have found the lasting effects of this beautiful Inn to have giving me my Serenity back. Living in Las  Vegas has a  tendency to bring a little stress at times. The tides washed it completely away. part of me didn't want to write this review in fear I would never be able to get a reservation again! We have
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you gathered serenity here at The Tides.  We strive to maintain that atmosphere and will be so happy to see you again.  Joe and Judy Wood

Summary: My husband and I are actually from the Orange County area, but due to a flood in our home needed a hotel. We stayed at the Tides off and on and got to try out 3 different rooms. All the rooms are decorated tastefully and are all a little different. Plus, there was nice extra Christmas decorations in the room which just gives the place a really nice feel to it. The towels and the sheets are VERY good quality- I got a great night's sleep. There is free wi-fi. 2 of the 3 rooms we were in had a mini fridge. All of them had air conditioning.  The service was great- we were given fresh fruit and every employee we interacted with was very friendly. The location is good, it is just a short walk into town... however, this place is not in the dead center of town, which, to me, makes it
Manager Response: We love it when you appreciate our location as much as we do:>)  And we enjoy knowing you went exploring to experience the quaint little city of Laguna Beach, all at your fingertips.  Joe and Judy Wood

Summary: Had a room reserved, Tides calls two days before to tell me they upgraded me to better room. I said the first room was fine but was assured this was better at same price. Room we got was Motel 6 size, TV was as old as I have had in hotel in years and had those wavey lines on top quarter of screen. You went to sleep when the people above you went to sleep and got up when they did. I could go on but I could have stayed at Newport Marriott or Hyatt for same price and will next go around
Manager Response: We are so sorry you were disappointed. Joe, Judy, Dale and I try very hard to provide a beautiful, comfortable, clean accomodation. Please enjoy your stay at the Newport Marriott. Linda Humes

Summary: Sweet service and plush room decor. Very comfortable, close to the beach, action and Pavillions.
Manager Response: How unique that you chose rooms with sayings fitting for each team member.  We thoroughly enjoyed your staff and hope you are back soon for the next meeting.  Joe and Judy Wood

Summary: My Executive team has stayed at the Tides many times.  They are a "fussy" group and everyone loved their stay.  I matched the wonderful quotes on the walls in each room to the message I wanted each of them to live "under" for our meetings. What a fun time!  The owners are wonderful in making you feel at home!  Perfect Laguna get-away!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a small 2 story motel/hotel located close to downtown Laguna Beach,  Premises are clean and tidy, which also described our room.  Our particular room was on the small side (under 300 sq ft) with 2 double beds.  I believe some of the rooms are larger.  Premises have a salt water pool which kids think is warm enough (heated) and adults think is on the cool side, the pool is well maintained.  The pool area has plenty of chairs and lounges for the size of the place.  There is also a barbecue.  I would suggest that you request a second floor room.  Our room was on the first floor and there was a track meet above us starting at 5:30am every morning.  There are a couple of rooms that are next to Hwy 101 which I would suggest you avoid.  Despite the negative remarks, we would
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for the complimentary feedback.  We appreciate that you would recommend us and hope you will be back soon.  Joe and Judy Wood

Summary: Perfect for an ocean get-away.  Rooms are warmly decorated and furnished with visitors' comfort in mind.  Beds very comfortable.  Staff welcoming and helpful.  Lovely tropical saltwater pool and patio area with BBQ facilities.  Short block to the ocean, several second story rooms have ocean views.  Restaurants, galleries and shopping in easy walking distance.  Very resonable price for the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We live close, but when friends come to visit, this is our home away from home.  The owners and employees really care about the property and give attention to all the sweet details.  Each room is unique, with lovely decor and beautiful sayings hand painted on each wall.  It is such a treat each time we visit The Tides!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is a pleasant place to stay. The owner Dale and the managers, Joe and Judy, are very gracious, welcoming and helpful. The rooms have been remodeled. Each room is decorated differently. Outside by the pool is a lovely, large patio area. Joe and Dale got the gas BBQ up and running for me to barbeque some steaks and filled the large fireplace with wood and kindling so we could enjoy a nice fire as we ate dinner. It was very enjoyable to sit by the fire, drinking wine, eating our steaks, salad and baked potato. We had our dog, Lily, with us. She was made to feel welcome too. We also found 3 wonderful dog friendly restaurants-Avila's Mexican Restaurant was excellent, Sun-Dried Tomato and Madison Square Restaurants were equally as good. The beaches and boardwalk are also
Manager Response: Many thanks for your kind report.  We are so delighted you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit so we can build another fire in the fireplace for you and fire up the grill.  Joe and Judy

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights in this charming Laguna Beach Inn. We knew it was going to be the perfect stay when we were greeted by the most wonderful and hospitable couple that manage the hotel. If I could personally give them a rating it would be an A+++++. Our Room was ready early and had all of the accommodations we could ever need, including a balcony with a fabulous view. The pool area was beautiful with a fire place and gas BBQ, perfect for an evening at the Inn. I would stay there again as many times as I could, especially because of the amazing hospitality and kindness of the hotel managers.
Manager Response: As owners,  we want you to know that we are as pleased with Joe and Judy as you, our guests, were.  Thank you so much for taking the time to post your  "Just Perfect' review.  It's appreciated ever so much.     Warm Regards,  Dale Johnson and Linda Humes

Summary: Wow! What a great place. Joe and Judy were wonderful hosts at this boutique motel, taking care of our wishes always with a smile. Of course they start off with a beautiful heated pool setting including a large gas BBQ grll, plenty of chairs and lounges with umbrellas, a bar setting, rooms which were all individual, and great maid service. The location is perfect, priced right and of course exceptonal weather.. We thoroughly enjoyed our three night there and hope to come back soon.
Manager Response: Sounds like you love The Tides as much as we do.  Thanks so much for all the compliments.  We try hard to make our place comfortable, clean and affordable.  Joe and Judy do such a fantastic time.  Looking forward to your return visit. Linda and Dale

Summary Heading: Really nice stay at the Tides
Summary: We stayed at the Tides in late July 2010. We booked directly with Dale ( the owner) who was very helpful. The hotel is really nice - clean, comfortable and homely. We received a warm welcome and Dale provided some useful insight into the best places to go locally. Although the weather was surprisingly disappointing for the time of year we still had a great stay.  Tip - try and get a room away from the main road as it may get a bit noisy.  Recommended!
Manager Response: So glad you had a great time.  Hoping to see you again soon. Thanks. Dale and Linda

Summary: We are an older couple from Ireland who stayed at this pleasant hotel in April/May 2010. We found it very comfortable, relaxed, and friendly.  Our room was perfect, with a kitchinette which had fridge/microwave/coffee maker for breakfast & snacks. The pool area has barbecue facilities - we had a barbecue while there, and they gave us all the equipment we needed - brilliant!  Top marks to management - Dale & Linda(?) who were so helpful and looked after our every need.   The hotel is situated in a nice area, within easy walking distance to shops, restaurants & beach.  On our next trip to California, we won't stay anywhere else but The Tides!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed at The Tides based on a recommendation from a friend.  I was not disappointed.  The Tides is cute and well-maintained with earnest and hospitable owners.    Rooms My room was quaint, spacious and simple. You can tell that steps have been taken to 'homify' the rooms--they feel less like a hotel room and more like someone's guest room.  The bathroom products are simple (not scented or anything) and they don't provide conditioner.  Although our room's carpet was stained, everything else was very well maintained and clean.  Location Sitting on the non-ocean side of the PCH, The Tides is a 3-min walk from the beach, 10-min walk from town and 2-min walk to restaurants like the Cottage and Las Brisas.  We stayed for 3 days and only used the car once.  Also inquire about
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here just one night while driving the PCH from San Francisco to San Diego.   Hotel is situated right on the main road, which was initially a little off-putting but we soon realised that it was pretty well insulated from any noise from the road.  Hotel was well located, not far from the beach and around a 10 minute stroll to the main streets with the shops and restaurants. We also made use of the pool which was nice (but cold!). The owners were also incredibly friendly and helpful.  Laguna is a nice town, with a good mix of being prettty but lively at the same time - we ate at place called Sorrento Grill, and the food was fabulous.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel near beach and downtown!!!!
Summary: The Tides Inn is a great little hotel that has very nice service and is close to the beach and downtown. It is has a nice salt water pool for people to swim in and relax pool side. It is only a block away from the beautiful beaches of Laguna Beach. The art galleries and downtown  is only a short walk away. The room was decorated very nicely and was very spacious.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay at The Tides. We do our best to make guests comfortable and happy. We're small (21 lovely rooms) but mighty!

Summary Heading: Found People and Dog Heaven at The Tides!
Summary: We stayed 6 days at The Tides in Laguna Beach.  The first night we were in Room 207 and then moved down to room 109.  Both were nice (upstairs had a small view of the ocean and we liked the set up of the kitchenette and room layout better in room 109).  The beds are comfy and the sheets were of high quality.  Joe and Judy (managers) are wonderful, friendly people, making us feel quite at home.  Our golden retriever especially liked the big bones Judy gave out! They offered us use of beach chairs and umbrellas, free of charge which was convenient. We loved the fact that we could grill and eat out on the pool deck at night with our dog as an alternative to eating out. Still, Laguna Beach is a very dog friendly town and most restaurants welcomed us and our 86-pd golden with open
Manager Response: You and your pup found a lot to wag about! Thank you for your unsolicited review of The Tides. We aim to please, and it sounds like we hit our mark. We'll look forward to seeing you and your 86-lb. friend here again!

Summary Heading: If you're looking for the perfect getaway, the TIdes Inn is THE place!
Summary: I visited Laguna Beach to celebrate a friends' milestone birthday.  I knew I would love Laguna Beach, but I had no idea that I happened upon the perfect hotel.  Even though there is no business center, the staff accommodated my every need from borrowing a pair of sunglasses to printing my boarding pass for my return flight.  My room had a fully stocked kitchen.  There is a Pavillions grocery store two blocks away, a lovely French bakery, and lots of restaurants within walking distance.  I stocked up on healthy options for breakfast and dined out for lunch and dinner.  Their pool area has a wonderful salt-water pool.  But that's NOT the best part!  There is an outdoor flireplace at one end and at the other, a built-in outdoor kitchen complete with JennAire gas grill,
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review of The Tides! You obviously "get" what The Tides is all about. We aim to please, as a locally owned and operated inn. We look forward to seeing you here again!

Summary: We stayed at The Tides Inn for 3 nights! It's location is ideally suited to walk to the town and to the beach! All of the staff are REALLY helpful. We would definately recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: You review of The Tides is so appreciated! Thank you for taking the time to tell others on TripAdvisor how much you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you here again!

Summary: We loved staying at The Tides.  It was an easy walk to a nice nearby grocery. I love being able to stock at least some food on a trip!  Really good pizza nearby as well. The park across the street was beautiful.  It was a pleasant walk to the center of Laguna...not the shortest, but certainly comfortable.  The staff/owners were so very helpful.  The pool was immaculate, the rooms fun and comfortable.  As other reviewers mentioned, it has a family feel.  I used Trip Advisor to choose this hotel, and thanks to previous reviews, it certainly lived up to expectations.  A wonderful place to stay; it truly enhanced our vacation!
Manager Response: We're glad to hear you used TripAdvisor to find The Tides. This is a handy site to get the "real scoop" on what's a good value in Laguna Beach and everywhere else. We strive to give it a "family feel," as you described. Thank you for your positive review!

Summary Heading: This place is FABULOUS! I can't wait to go back!
Summary: We stayed here with our grown children from SF and DC. Everyone was very happy with not only the cute rooms but also the cleanliness! Too many beach hotels are just that beach hotels and their standards of cleanliness and service reflect just that. The Tides is clean, cute, and has the BEST staff! Dale and the other staff will bend over backwards to make sure  you are comfortable and have a great time. They have firewood, beach towels, a barbecue grill, beach chairs etc anything you would want for a nice lounge at the pool or on the beach. They even have tons of books for your to borrow. We will stay here everytime we go to Laguna Beach, we love this place! Thank you Dale and the gang for a great vacation!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! The Tides makes an extra effort to make its property a perfect place for families to meet and relax together. Thats why we provide all the extras that you don't get (at least for free) at any of the chain hotels. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Great little spot for a weekend getaway!
Summary: I was looking for an attractive, affordable spot in Laguna for a weekend getaway, and this was the perfect place! Great location, walking distance to many shops and resturants. We stayed in a quaint, adorable room. The staff was extremely friendly and hospitable; it made our experience that much better! I will definitely be going back!
Manager Response: The Tides is all about affordable and adorable! Thank you for noticing and for taking the time to write your review.

Summary: Stayed two nights, first in 103 then 203. Very pleasant and welcoming greeting. Room 103 was lovely, tastefully decorated with cute touches. The kitchenette isn't really any use for cooking, microwave and fridge but few utensils and kitchenware; guess that's what the ette means.   Moved to room 203 and less impressed. They had stressed that it was small and it was only $99 (plus tax - we've found only The Natural Cafe quote inclusive prices, as if the tax is optional...) but they didn't mention the absence of a window. Close the doors in the bedroom and imagine you're in a tastefully decorated ship's interior cabin.   Aside from the rooms, the pool area is well cared for and very inviting. The wi-fi is fast and reliable. It's a quick trot over the road to the cliff tops and down
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Pleasant Affordable Accomodation in Laguna Beach
Summary: My wife and I decided to stay in Laguna Beach since we hadn't been there in years.  Travelling with our trusty Hugo the Mighty Dachshund proved no problem as Laguna Beach has many dog-friendly hotels, one of which is The Tides Inn.    Located on the very busy PCH with off-street parking, The Tides is an affordable and very pleasant place to stay.  Above standard linens and decor make it a great value, and the friendly and helpful staff make it a place that you'd come back to.    Our room had a kitchenette, a king bed, and a partial ocean view.  The beach itself is just a short block away where you'll find great walks and warm surf.  The hotel has a small pool and a place to BBQ, as well as a small outdoor fireplace to sit and review your day.    Some will criticize the fact that
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife and I and our two dogs, just returned from our four night vacation at The Tides Inn in Laguna Beach. Had a great stay. Staff was friendly and made every effort to accomodate our needs. Very pet friendly and welcomed our dogs with treats and a  doggie throw for the bed. Our room was nicely decorated with a very comfortable bed, nice linens and plush pillows. We had a kitchenette which included a frig,micro wave,coffee pot and sink. Outside was a large pool area which included a gas grill, wood burning fireplace and lounge area for family gatherings . Located on Pacific Coast Highway close to dowtown shops and main beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for the good review. We are glad you and your pooches felt welcomed and comfy! Please come back and stay with us again soon.

Summary: Ist time stay; however i lived in southern california for 30years and the only road was pacific coast hwy. As a teenager you do not enjoy these restaurants and motels, hotels, etc.   but just cruising and chasing the beautiful women in california. Great memories of the beach cities and taking my buddies back to their miltary bases ( air force, marines , coast guard) after our parties in the fog.
